Banner.Description: I have 1.8+ years of experience building secure, scalable web applications using ASP.NET Core (Web API & MVC) and crafting responsive, high-performance interfaces with Angular. I focus on clean architecture, best coding practices, and strengthening applications with security-first development and cloud-ready deployments.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs:
Hi! I’m Aniket Joshi, a Full Stack .NET Developer with a strong focus on building reliable, secure, and scalable applications. With over 1.8 years of professional experience, I’ve worked across the full development lifecycle from designing APIs to deploying production-ready Angular applications on Azure.

My core expertise lies in ASP.NET Core, Angular, and SQL Server, where I emphasize clean code, performance optimization, and maintainability. Alongside development, I actively explore application security, applying OWASP best practices and secure coding standards to reduce vulnerabilities.

I enjoy solving real-world problems, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and continuously improving systems through refactoring, automation, and CI/CD pipelines. My goal is to build software that not only works efficiently but is also resilient, secure, and future-ready.
MyName.Title: Aniket Joshi
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Freelance .NET Developer
Description: Developed small to mid-scale RESTful APIs using ASP.NET Core to strengthen backend architecture and performance.
Built practice and deployment environments using Docker, NGINX, and GitHub Actions.
Performed basic web application security testing using OWASP ZAP and Nmap.
Focused on improving secure coding practices while preparing for the CEH certification.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Junior Dotnet developer
Description: Worked on enterprise-level modules using ASP.NET Core and Angular within an Agile development environment.
Resolved 50+ QA and UAT issues, contributing to improved application stability and reduced production defects.
Collaborated closely with QA, product owners, and senior developers to ensure timely sprint deliveries.
Engagement concluded as the project was put on hold due to internal restructuring.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Dotnet developer
Description: Led backend and frontend development for a global shipping management system using .NET 7 and Angular.
Enabled real-time tracking and management of 1,000+ container shipments across global supply chains.
Integrated Azure AD B2C authentication and encrypted document storage, reducing security incidents by 40%.
Configured Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF) to mitigate DDoS and injection attacks.
Implemented automated CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps, reducing deployment time by 50%.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: CryptoSteller
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An AI-powered cryptocurrency analytics platform providing real-time crypto prices, market insights, and automated summaries. Includes secure authentication and interactive dashboards for tracking market trends.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: ECourtFlow
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A Differentiated Case Flow Management (DCM) system designed to streamline judicial workflows with role-based dashboards for judges, clerks, and administrators.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: ECourtFlow
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A judiciary case management system aimed at reducing hearing delays and improving case transparency for advocates and judges.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: SocialShare
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A community-driven platform enabling developers to collaborate, share knowledge, and solve coding challenges efficiently.

Achievement.Title: Achievements

Achievement.Items.Title: Certificate of Appreciation – CleverGround (2025)
Achievement.Items.Description: Received a Certificate of Appreciation from CleverGround for responsibly disclosing critical security vulnerabilities identified during independent security testing, helping improve the organization’s overall security posture.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I’m always open to discussing new opportunities, projects, or collaborations. If you’re looking for a passionate Full Stack .NET Developer who values clean code and secure systems, feel free to reach out.
Certification.Title: Certifications

Certification.Items.Title: Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH)
Certification.Items.Description: Demonstrated hands-on knowledge of ethical hacking, vulnerability assessment, penetration testing, OWASP Top 10, network security, and secure application practices.

Certification.Items.Title: Certificate of Appreciation – CleverGround
Certification.Items.Description: Recognized by CleverGround for responsibly disclosing critical security vulnerabilities and supporting secure, ethical development practices.

Certification.Items.Title: Advent of Cyber
Certification.Items.Description: Completed Advent of Cyber by TryHackMe, gaining hands-on exposure to real-world cybersecurity concepts including network security, web exploitation, malware analysis, and defensive security through daily practical challenges.

Certification.Items.Title: Advanced C#: Object-Oriented Programming
Certification.Items.Description: Advanced understanding of C# language features, OOP principles, clean code practices, and application design patterns.

Certification.Items.Title: Secure Software Development
Certification.Items.Description: Focused on secure coding standards, threat modeling, vulnerability mitigation, and building resilient applications.
